tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Al-Fajr, Ayah 17?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The position of the contented soul is attained by one who ponders over God’s signs in the universe; who derives spiritual nourishment, learns lessons and receives guidance from historical events; who proves that if there is a clash between the self and the Truth, he will ignore the self and accep...
distractors: This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse narrates a historical event
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: His power of speech indicates that there is One capable of speech over and above him, who has bestowed upon him the power of speech and showed him the right path
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse narrates a historical event
